title: Notable Video Game Releases: New and Upcoming
text: February 26, 2017 - 3 comments mattiscool7337 : Wish that the ALBUM with the highest metacritic score would win at the Grammys, too smh Read » DanBurrito : That La La Land/Moonlight mix up has to be the most embarrassing and awkward moment in Oscar history. If Warren... Read » LamontRaymond : 99 Metascore, #1 on the Critic Top 10 Compilation & Scorecard, and Best Picture - seems like the Metacritic... Read » Comasi : I personally loved La La Land but I hope Moonlight wins Best Picture/Director. Read » February 1, 2017 - 10 comments ConJoJohn : @JasonDietz Oh true hey thanks! Read » JasonDietz : @ConJoJohn: We actually had an AM/PM mixup with the closing time, but your picks have been recorded. Read » ConJoJohn : Hey... Wait a second. Pacific IS four hours behind Atlantic! Why did the polls close early? That's not cool. I... Read » ConJoJohn : Also my name's Connor Johnson if you want to add me to the poll results lol.
